mapper.update:
update phone SET name=#{name}, image=#{image}, type=#{type}, color=#{color}, os=#{os}, cellType= #{cellType}, bc=#{bc}, ram=#{ram}, sc=#{sc}, networkType=#{networkType}, touchScreenType=#{touchScreenType}, networkMold=#{networkMold}, resolutionRatio=#{resolutionRatio}, postpositionCamera=#{postpositionCamera}, cameraType=#{cameraType}, videoFormat=#{videoFormat}, style=#{style}, keyboardType=#{keyboardType}, thickness=#{thickness}
name=#{name};
